sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Man's monitor, or, The free-school of virtue; holding forth the duties required and sins forbidden in the two tables of the law. In easie English vers [sic]. Fit to bee implanted in the memories of all Christian children. / By W. Barton preacher of God's word at North-winfield in Darby-shire. Barton, William
[8], 45, [2].
Printed by W.D. for T. Underhill; and are to bee sold at the Blue Anchor in Pau'ls [sic] Church-yard., London : 1655.
Errata: prelim. p. [8]. Imperfect: cropped and tightly bound, with loss of text. Reproduction of original in: Eton College. Library.
=======
